As ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on
May 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3239, To make improvements in the enactment of title 41, United States Code, into a positive law title and to improve the Code

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 84 (Friday, May 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FITZGERALD:
H.R. 3239.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, clause 18.
[Page H2357]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To make improvements in the enactment of title 41, United States Code, into a positive law title and to improve the Code.
